name: Love Is Blind - Brackeys Game Jam 2
name_original: Love Is Blind - Brackeys Game Jam 2
description:
Summary

You are Hearty McHeartface, scored and damaged you must chase love to restore yourself.

Controls

A = Quick Select Spell.

D = Fire Spell/Interact With Book.

Space = Dismiss Spell.

Recommended Settings

1920 x 1080

Full Screen

Any feedback is appreciated.

Brackeys Game Jam 2 Entry.
